", "answer": "Any group of 15 registered farmers involved in agricultural activities is eligible to apply for the FIG scheme. \n"}, {"question": "What type of financial assistance does the FIG scheme provide? ", "answer": "The FIG scheme provides grants for purchasing office equipment, technical bulletins, setting up a library, training, issuing ID cards, and for district-level meetings.
